title: Geoswift Management Explains Its Role in Facilitating Trade with China on Worldwide Business with kathy ireland
text:
MMP (USA), Inc. 
LOS ANGELES -- (BUSINESS WIRE) -- MMP (USA) announces a Worldwide Business with kathy ireland exclusive interview with Raymond Qu, Founder and CEO of Geoswift and Dana Nino Executive Vice President of Geoswift US Inc. Qu states, “Providing payment in local currency is vital to proper conversion and operational efficiency when selling in China. We help with that and other financial requirements.” 
Qu further notes, “China’s monetary policy for decades was 'easy-in, difficult-out.' However, its large foreign reserve has caused a reversal in this attitude to better manage the country’s risk. Because of these changes and other factors, even the largest companies can be and often are confused and frustrated. We address that problem by efficiently facilitating one-stop China cross-border payments.” 
Headquartered in Hong Kong, Geoswift has a number of international offices, including London and San Francisco. The company consults with local regulatory bodies in order to adapt the flow of their compliance requirements to ensure smooth and compliant handling of payments to business partners in China. 
Geoswift specializes in working with companies involved in travel, e-commerce and education. The company also addresses the need for companies to accept payments from Chinese customers, particularly in the e-commerce market segment. 
JL Haber, Vice President of Programming for Worldwide Business with kathy ireland, comments, “Many of our viewers are involved in, or are considering participation in, the fascinating Chinese market. We’re excited to introduce them to Geoswift and the vital services they perform.” 
Tune in to see Geoswift on Fox Business Network as sponsored programming on September 20, 2015 at 5:30pm ET and on Bloomberg International as sponsored programming at 8:30am CET, 3:00pm HKT, and 10:00am CDT.
